meanings.definition: A marine invertebrate of the phylum Urochordata, including tunicates and sea squirts.
meanings.sent1: The urochordate swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of urochordates in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The urochordate decided to throw a party under the sea.
meanings.sent4: Like a mysterious creature from a fairy tale, the urochordate appeared out of the depths.
meanings.sent5: Children were amazed by the colorful urochordate they saw at the aquarium.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of urochordates.
meanings.sent1: The urochordate ecosystem is fragile and unique.
meanings.sent2: Her research focused on the urochordate species found in the deep sea.
meanings.sent3: The urochordate fashion trend took the underwater world by storm.
meanings.sent4: His music had a urochordate quality, soothing and mysterious.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the essence of the urochordate landscape in her painting.
